description: A React component implementing a connect page for OAuth integrations with JIRA and Confluence, handling UI state and redirection logic.

methods.name: ConnectPage
methods.description: Main React component rendering the connect page, wrapping the inner component with Suspense.

methods.name: ConnectInner
methods.description: Inner component managing OAuth connection logic, UI state, and redirection to backend OAuth endpoints.

methods.name: startOAuth
methods.description: Function initiating OAuth flow by redirecting the browser to backend login URL for either JIRA or Confluence.
